Pre-Test

 

The design of this eLearning course includes both a Pre-Test activity and a Post-Test activity.  The Pre-Test activity enables you to reflect on some of the concepts covered in the module, to assess your current knowledge and to potentially identify areas where additional learning might be of benefit.  These tests also enable the course developers to measure the success of the module design and to identify improvements that might make the module more effective.

 

Please note that the Pre-Test is an optional activity while the Post-Test is required.  We encourage you to take advantage of both activities. Please complete the Pre-Test.
